page.title: 15Being an Atheist.
page.content: I am an atheist, I don't believe that Jesus ever lived and I think that Jesus was just a story that people told and thought it was true. So people began to worship Jesus and to say that he was the son of god, but I don't pray to him unless I am at school and we have to pray. My nanny was a Christian and christened my mother but as my mother grew older she did not believe in god and Jesus, but my aunty believes in god and is a christian. My nanny does not believe in god any more either.
